website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a Roblox set with an everyday theme that will appeal to most youngsters and game enthusiasts, this is a practical choice.
pros: Cute set with a relateable, real-life theme
Includes pizza chef, delivery boy, pizza, and scooter
Kids express enthusiasm when comparing characters to the online game
cons: At least one customer received the wrong Roblox set

customer_reviews.title: I had been on the hunt for these!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had me on the hunt for these. She had me searching multiple stores with no luck. I finally found these on here, and once they arrived-- I ended up finding them on another website for about $5 cheaper. Regardless, they are cute little toys and my daughter is happy!
customer_reviews.author: D.O.

customer_reviews.title: Once again Roblox knocks it out of the park!
customer_reviews.text: My kid's love the roblox figures! They have quite the collection. This was a nice addition. I love that these figures are sturdy,interchangeable, affordable and the details.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!...but I only recieved half of what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: My children love the Roblox toys! Unfortunately only one of my children received a set for Christmas because I ordered the Pizza Delivery set for one and the Prison Life for the other. I still have not recieved the Prison Life set even though it says it was delivered and I sent an email but still no reply
customer_reviews.author: The Barker Bunch

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately if you’re not careful pieces can snap. A friend broke his and I rebought the set since this ones his favorite. Love that it matches the game.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerlily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved by my grand daughter! Very excited to receive. Great detail and prompt delivery. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A. Toma

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: A very awesome ROBLOX gamepack great to have I like it a lot. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Victor M Regalado jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special and over priced
customer_reviews.text: Roblox items are all way too overpriced for the very few pieces you get on top of which there’s really not much “play” that can be done with them either. If it weren’t for the fact that my kids are obsessed with the game I would never purchase
customer_reviews.author: Charles lee

customer_reviews.title: Pizza cart was delightful
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a cake topper but made the pizza man into a baker by molding soft candies into a cake and making it a replica of the cake it was on. My grandson was delighted.
customer_reviews.author: jkfooten

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Box was a bit bent but otherwise in tact merchandise. My son is a huge fan of Roblox and we play this particular roblox game all the time. I cant wait to give this to him on Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Danie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth much whats in it
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, but for 12 dollars, all I get is 3 boxes, 2 figures, the scooter and the code, I think the scooter and the code bumps up the price, but it's kinda overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Previously opened, but still good.
customer_reviews.text: Product was already partially opened(reasoning for 4 stars). However, all the pieces were there and the virtual gift was still intact.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Nowicki

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: First set of robolox that I bought my son. I had no clue what I was buying but they are cute and fin to play with. Both kids love the Pizza man robolox
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sawicki

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pieces fall apart. I cant keep the legs on. If I glue them, they no longer move. My kid loved it. She loves the game. She still pretends with them.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy D.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: So much for it being a gift half opened and smashed but all the pieces were there gave it to my son and ill have to buy another from somewhere else

customer_reviews.title: Roblox and Pizza - A great combo

customer_reviews.title: Son loved it

product_meta.title: Roblox Action Collection - Work at a Pizza Place Game Pack [Includes Exclusive Virtual Item]
product_meta.description: Style:Work at a Pizza PlaceBuilder Brothers Pizza needs your help! Relive Dued1’s classic Roblox experience and deliver these pizzas on time! Chef Meet the man behind the pizza. Olive oil courses through his veins, his muscles are made of mozzarella, and his legendary culinary skills are a sight to behold. He is…the Pizza Chef. Pizza Delivery Guy When you’ve got dozens of pizzas to deliver in one night, you need a pro – like Pizza Delivery Guy! There’s nothing like cruising around town on a motor scooter with a box full of piping hot delicious pizzas. Just make sure he doesn’t eat them on the way to his destination.
feature_bullets: Take your favorite Roblox adventures off the screen and into the real world with this unique game pack, featuring two iconic characters and accessories
Mix and match parts to build your own unique Roblox character
Deck out your figures with the included accessories
Each package comes with a redeemable code to unlock an exclusive virtual item on Roblox
Collect all your favorite Roblox figures today

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
